title: Do Not Sell At Any Price: The Wild, Obsessive Hunt for
description:
Amanda Petrusich, "Do Not Sell At Any Price: The Wild, Obsessive Hunt for the World's Rarest 78rpm Records"

ISBN: 1451667051 | 2014 | EPUB | 272 pages | 3 MB

The untold story of a quirky and important subculture: The world of 78rpm records and the insular community that celebrates themÃ¢â‚¬â€by acclaimed music critic and author Amanda Petrusich, who contributes regularly to Pitchfork, The Oxford American, and The New York Times.

Before MP3s, CDs, and cassette tapes, even before LPs or 45s, the world listened to music on 78rpm recordsÃ¢â‚¬â€those fragile, 10-inch shellac discs. While vinyl records have enjoyed a renaissance in recent years, good 78s are exponentially harder to come by and play. A recent eBay auction for the only known copy of a particular record topped out at $37,100. Do Not Sell at Any Price explores the rarified world of the 78rpm recordÃ¢â‚¬â€from the formatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s heyday to its near extinctionÃ¢â‚¬â€and how collectors and archivists are working frantically to preserve the music before itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lost forever.
